name: Musical Comedy
description: Heavily utilizes music in its delivery of humor.

children.name: Comedy Rap
children.description: Primarily intended to be humorous, through the use of comedic lyrics, production, delivery, or other musical aspects.

children.name: Comedy Rock
children.description: Roughly defined as a mix of Rock or any of its subgenres with elements of Comedy such as Satire and Musical Parody, as well as concepts of Novelty.

children.name: Scrumpy and Western
children.description: Usually humorous music originating from England's West Country, heavily featuring traditional English folk instruments and often sung in the West Country accent.
